snippet: An anarchist group claimed responsibility for Friday’s attacks, citing coverage of the financial crisis that the group denounced as sympathetic to austerity programs.
abstract: Greek police are looking for those responsible for detonating makeshift bombs at homes of five journalists in Athens; attack is latest in series of actions taken against reporters there that have raised questions about deteriorating climate for media freedom.
lead_paragraph: An anarchist group claimed responsibility for Friday’s attacks, citing coverage of the financial crisis that the group denounced as sympathetic to austerity programs.

headline.seo: Greek Police Search for Culprits in Bombings at Journalists’ Homes
headline.main: Journalists in Greece Are Becoming Targets
headline.print_headline: Journalists in Greece Are Becoming Targets
